description.@en: We are the suicide squad, condemned to die on the battlefield.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Warfare Tests. When you succeed, it is considered a Critical Success. In addition, add 1D6 Fury Die to Damage with any weapon with the Bomb Quality.
